modName: VR-ENB - Skyrim Vibrant and Realistic - with SSAO and DOF
summary: This mod is a ENB setting for a realistic lighting, vibrant colors, dark but still playable nights and caverns. Various effects are included for an optimal immersion, such as SSAO, HD6\'s cinematic filter and Matso\'s depth of field.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description[/b]

This mod is a ENB setting for a realistic lighting, vibrant colors, dark but still playable nights and caverns.
Various effects are included for an optimal immersion, such as SSAO, HD6\'s cinematic filter and Matso\'s depth of field.

[img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/8562/bannerjsg.png[/img]

A good PC configuration is required : expect around 10 fps drop.
If you like my settings, please endorse me, and EvoFq3o0 + Matso works too :)

[b]Credits[/b]

Thanks to everyone who made this mod possible, at first Boris (and his unique ENBSeries) and of course HD6, EvoFq3o0 and Matso.
This configuration is mostly based on EvoFq3o0 - ENB v102 with FXAA and SSAO Full Quality- The way : [url=\'http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5948\']http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5948[/url].
I\'ve also used and tweaked the awesome dof effect created by Matso for his own mod : [url=\'http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5587\']http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5587[/url].
In no means am I claiming ownership or creation of any of the files, I have only tweaked to change the visual rendering.

[b]Installation[/b]

1. Backup all ENB files you have in your Skyrim directory ([YourSteamLocation]\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\)
2. Unzip the contents of the archive into this directory

[b]Desintallation[/b]

Delete the current ENB files and restore those backuped during intallation.
author: phaistos
